hymn.title: There's a part inside of me
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—Dealing with the Heart
hymn.chords: | C - G/B - | Am - C/G - | F - G7/F - | C/E - G - | C - G/B - | Am - C/G - | F - C/E D7/F# | C/G G7 C - | C - C7/E - | F - G7/F - | Em - Am - | Dm7 - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - D7/F# - | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: There's a part in -- side of me— It's my con -- science, and I see, If I lis -- ten and o -- bey, I will be pre -- served this way. Yes, I will lis -- ten, Yes, to my con -- science; If I will lis -- ten, Then I will be pre -- served.

lyrics.stanza: There's a part inside of me— It's my conscience, and I see, If I listen and obey, I will be preserved this way.
Yes, I will listen, Yes, to my conscience; If I will listen, Then I will be preserved.
